patterns: what are some early signs of heart attack?
responses:
%%%%%%% SOME ARE %%%%%%%%%
 1)Chest discomfort
 2) Discomfort in other areas of the upper body.
 3) Shortness of breath
 5) Other possible signs include breaking out in a cold sweat, nausea or lightheadedness.

patterns: what are the prefered diet for heart?
what are the prefered diet for good heart?
responses:
$$$$$$$$$$ PREFERED DIETS PLAN COULD BE $$$$$$$$$$$
 1) Eat more vegetables and fruits
 2) Select whole grains
 3) Limit unhealthy fats
 4) Choose low-fat protein sources
 5) Reduce the salt (sodium) in your food

patterns: what are the prefered tests for heart attacks?
responses:
*** The below mentioned tests may help | contacting doctor is recommended ***
 1) ElectroCardiogram
 2) Treadmill stress test
 3) Stress echocardiography
 4) Nuclear stress test
 5) Cardiac computed tomography (CT) Angiography
 6) Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) stress test

A heart attack occurs when one or more of your coronary arteries becomes blocked.
 Over time, a buildup of fatty deposits, including cholesterol, form substances called plaques,
 which can narrow the arteries (atherosclerosis).
 This condition, called coronary artery disease, causes most heart attacks.

patterns: what are the symptoms of heart attack?
responses:
*** POSSIBLE SYMPTOMS include ****
 1) Tightness in chest
 2) Pain in chest
 3) Pain in neck
 4) Pain in Back or Arms
 5) Fatigue
 6) Lightheadedness
 7) Abnormal Heartbeat
 8) Anxiety
 ARE MAJORILY OBSERVED
